    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    MainServer.handleCall(Game game, String playerId, SocketChannel sc)
    Handles the "CALL" command, where a player matches the current bet in the round.
    String
    MainServer.handleCards(Game game, String playerId)
    Handles the "CARDS" command, retrieving and displaying the player's current hand in the game.
    String
    MainServer.handleCheck(Game game, String playerId, SocketChannel sc)
    Handles the "CHECK" command, allowing a player to check (i.e., pass their turn without betting) during a betting round.
    String
    MainServer.handleExchange(Game game, String playerId, List<Integer> indexes, SocketChannel sc)
    Handles the "EXCHANGE" command, allowing a player to exchange a certain number of their cards.
    String
    MainServer.handleFold(Game game, String playerId)
    Handles the "FOLD" command, allowing a player to fold (quit the current round) during a betting round.
    void
    MainServer.handleGameOver(Game game)
    Handles the game over scenario by notifying all players that the betting round has finished, and then resetting the game state for the next round or session.
    String
    MainServer.handleJoin(Game game, String playerId, String[] tokens, SocketChannel sc)
    Handles the "JOIN" command, where a player joins an existing game by providing their player ID and an initial betting amount.
    void
    MainServer.handleLastPlayerStanding(Game game)
    Handles the case where there is only one player remaining in the game.
    String
    MainServer.handleRaise(Game game, String playerId, String[] tokens, SocketChannel sc)
    Handles the "RAISE" command, allowing a player to increase their current bet during a betting round.
    String
    MainServer.handleReady(Game game, String playerId)
    Handles the "READY" command, marking the player as ready for the game to start.
    String
    MainServer.handleStatus(Game game, String playerId)
    Handles the "STATUS" command, which provides the current state of the game, including the game ID, the current state of the game (e.g., waiting for players, in progress), the current player, the blinds, and the pot amount.
    void
    MainServer.notifyAllPlayers(Game game, String message)
    Sends a message to all players in the game.
    void
    MainServer.notifyBettingRoundFinished(Game game)
    Notifies all players that a betting round has finished.
    void
    MainServer.notifyGameStartToPlayers(Game game)
    Notifies all players about the start of the game.
    void
    MainServer.notifyGameStateToPlayers(Game game)
    Notifies all players in the game about the current game state.
    void
    MainServer.notifyPlayerExchange(Game game, String playerId)
    Notifies all players about a specific player's card exchange action.
    void
    MainServer.notifyPlayerExchangeIfFolded(Game game, String playerId)
    Notifies all players that a specific player has skipped their turn because they have folded.
    void
    MainServer.resetGameOnServer(Game game)
    Resets the state of the game on the server when the game is over.
    void
    MainServer.sendHandPlayers(Game game)
    Sends each player's hand (cards) and the current pot value to all players in the game.
